SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network

Class ClientConnectorRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Network.ClientConnectorRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientConnector, ClientRemoteInterface, Remote
public class ClientConnectorRMI extends Object implements ClientConnector, ClientRemoteInterface
The ClientConnectorRMI class is an implementation of the ClientConnector interface using RMI.
It is responsible for establishing a connection with the server, listening for packets from the server, and sending packets to the server.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ClientConnectorRMI(String serverIp, ClientController controller, ClientModel model)
    Constructs a ClientConnectorRMI object with the specified server IP address and client controller and then starts the local RMI register and adds itself to it.
    Then it connects to the server's RMI listener from which it obtains the id for the client handler, after which it connects to the client handler and confirms the connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    receivePacket(ServerClientPacket received)
    Delivers a ServerClientPacket from the server to the client side for further handling.
    void
    sendPacket(ClientServerPacket packet)
    Sends a packet to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientConnectorRMI

      public ClientConnectorRMI(String serverIp, ClientController controller, ClientModel model) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a ClientConnectorRMI object with the specified server IP address and client controller and then starts the local RMI register and adds itself to it.
      Then it connects to the server's RMI listener from which it obtains the id for the client handler, after which it connects to the client handler and confirms the connection.
      Parameters:
      serverIp - The IP address of the server to connect to.
      controller - The client controller associated with this client connector.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
